/* Cus_Restrictions.xml - getWithdrawalListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT report.reported_mem_no AS mem_no ,IFNULL(basic.mem_nick, (SELECT mem_nick FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak WHERE mem_no = report.reported_mem_no)) AS mem_nick ,IFNULL(basic.mem_sex, (SELECT mem_sex FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak WHERE mem_no = report.reported_mem_no)) AS mem_sex ,IFNULL(basic.mem_name, (SELECT mem_name FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak WHERE mem_no = report.reported_mem_no)) AS mem_name ,IFNULL(basic.mem_userid, (SELECT mem_userid FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak WHERE mem_no = report.reported_mem_no)) AS mem_userid ,IFNULL(basic.ip, (SELECT ip FROM rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak WHERE mem_no = report.reported_mem_no)) AS ip , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rd_data.tb_member_report WHERE reported_mem_no = basic.mem_no AND status != '0' AND op_code != '1') AS sanctions_cnt , report.status AS status , report.op_code AS op_code , report.etc AS op_etc , basic.mem_state AS mem_state , report.op_name AS op_name , report.reason AS reason , report.op_msg AS op_msg , (SELECT device_uuid FROM rd_data.tb_member_session_history WHERE mem_no = basic.mem_no ORDER BY last_upd_date DESC LIMIT 1) AS device_uuid , basic.mem_phone AS mem_phone , report.op_date AS start_date , basic.block_end_date AS end_date , ((date_format(now(),'%Y') - basic.mem_birth_year) + 1) as mem_age FROM (SELECT * FROM rd_data.tb_member_basic WHERE mem_state != 1) AS basic LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_report AS report ON report.idx = (SELECT MAX(idx) FROM rd_data.tb_member_report WHERE reported_mem_no = basic.mem_no AND status != '0' AND op_code != '1') LEFT JOIN rd_data.tb_member_stmp_token AS token ON report.reported_mem_no = token.mem_no
report.reported_mem_no IS NOT NULL
AND report.op_code = #{opCode}
ORDER BY report.op_date desc ) AS a
AND a.mem_no like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.mem_name like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.mem_userid like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.mem_nick like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.mem_phone like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.device_uuid like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND a.ip like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%')
AND ( a.mem_no like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR a.mem_name like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR a.mem_userid like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR a.mem_nick like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR a.mem_phone like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR a.device_uuid like concat ('%', #{searchText}, '%') )
